abricate.description: Abricate - Mass screening of contigs for antimicrobial and virulence genes

any2fasta.description: any2fasta - Convert various sequence formats to FASTA

ariba.description: Ariba - Antimicrobial Resistance Identification By Assembly

augur.description: augur - a bioinformatics toolkit to track evolution from sequence and serological data

auspice.description: auspice - an open-source interactive web app for visualizing phylogenomic data

bbtools.description: BBTools - Suite of fast, multithreaded bioinformatics tools for DNA and RNA sequence data
bbtools.help:
BBTools shell script must be specified, e.g. staphb-tk bbtools bbmap.sh, staphb-tk bbtools bbduk.sh, etc. 

More info on BBTools at https://jgi.doe.gov/data-and-tools/bbtools/bb-tools-user-guide/.

bcftools.description: BCFTools - Variant calling and manipulating files in the Variant Call Format (VCF) and its binary counterpart BCF

bedtools.description: bedtools - a swiss-army knife of tools for a wide-range of genomics analysis tasks

bwa.description: BWA - mapping low-divergent sequences against a large reference genome

canu.description: Canu - Long read assembly and polishing tools

centroid.description: centroid - a tool for determining an ideal reference genome from a set of fasta files

cfsan-snp-pipeline.description: CFSAN-SNP - SNP calling pipeline from the FDA CFSAN laboratory

circlator.description: Circlator - A tool to circularize genome assemblies

clustalo.description: ClustalO - A fast multiple sequence alignment program

colorid.description: Colorid - Experiments with using BIGSI data structure for metagenomic and QC applications

emm-typing-tool.description: Emm-typing-tool - Group A streptococci emm typing tool for NGS data

fastani.description: FastANI - Fast whole-genome sequence average nucleotide identity (ANI) estimation

fastqc-scan.description: fastq-scan - reads a FASTQ from STDIN and outputs summary statistics (read lengths, per-read qualities, per-base qualities) in JSON format

fastqc.description: FastQC - A quality control tool for high throughput sequence data

fasttree.description: FastTree - Infers approximately-maximum-likelihood phylogenetic trees from alignments of nucleotide or protein sequences

filtlong.description: Filtlong - Quality filtering tool for long reads

flye.description: Flye - De novo assembler for single molecule sequencing reads using repeat graphs

hmmer.description: HMMER - used for searching sequence databases for sequence homologs, and for making sequence alignments. It implements methods using probabilistic models called profile hidden Markov models (profile HMMs)

iqtree.description: IQ-TREE - A fast and effective stochastic algorithm to infer phylogenetic trees by maximum likelihood

iqtree2.description: IQ-TREE2 - A fast and effective stochastic algorithm to infer phylogenetic trees by maximum likelihood

ivar.description: iVar - Computational package that contains functions broadly useful for viral amplicon-based sequencing

kleborate.description: Kleborate - a tool to screen genome assemblies of Klebsiella pneumoniae and the Klebsiella pneumoniae species complex

kma.description: KMA - Mapping method designed to map raw reads directly against redundant databases, in an ultra-fast manner using seed and extend

kraken.help: Please specify a Kraken subcommand: kraken-build, kraken

kraken2.help: Please specify a Kraken2 subcommand: kraken2-build, kraken2-inspect, kraken2

ksnp3.description: kSNP3 - Identifies the pan-genome SNPs in a set of genome sequences, and estimates phylogenetic trees based upon those SNPs

legsta.description: Legsta - In silico Legionella pneumophila Sequence Based Typing

lyveset.description: LYVE-SET - a method of using hqSNPs to create a phylogeny
lyveset.help:
Lyev-SET perl script must be specified, e.g. staphb-tk lyveset launch_set.pl, staphb-tk lyveset set_manage.pl, staphb-tk lyveset run_assembly_readMeterics.pl. 

More info on Lyve-SET usage at: github.com/lskatz/lyve-SET.

mafft.description: MAFFT - multiple sequence alignment program for amino acid or nucleotide sequences

mash.description: MASH - Fast genome and metagenome distance estimation using MinHash

mashtree.description: MashTree - Create a tree using Mash distances

medaka.description: Medaka - Sequence correction provided by ONT Research

minimap2.description: Minimap2 - a versatile sequence alignment program that aligns DNA or mRNA sequences against a large reference database

minipolish.description: Minipolish - A tool for Racon polishing of miniasm assemblies

mlst.description: MLST - Scan contig files against PubMLST typing schemes

mugsy.description: Mugsy - A multiple whole genome aligner

multiqc.description: MultiQC - Aggregate results from bioinformatics analyses across many samples into a single report

nanoplot.description: NanoPlot - Plotting scripts for long read sequencing data

ncbi-amrfinder-plus.description: NCBI AMRFinderPlus - Designed to find acquired antimicrobial resistance genes and some point mutations in protein or assembled nucleotide sequences

orthofinder.description: OrthoFinder - Phylogenetic orthology inference for comparative genomics

pangolin.description: Pangolin - Phylogenetic Assignment of Named Global Outbreak LINeages

piggy.description: Piggy - a tool for analysing the intergenic component of bacterial genomes. It is designed to be used in conjunction with Roary

pilon.description: Pilon - Automated genome assembly improvement and variant detection tool

plasmidseeker.description: PlasmidSeeker - A k-mer based program for the identification of known plasmids from whole-genome sequencing reads

racon.description: Racon - Long read assembly and polishing tools

rasusa.description: RASUA - Randomly subsample sequencing reads to a specified coverage

raven.description: Raven - a de novo genome assembler for long uncorrected reads

roary.description: Roary - Rapid large-scale prokaryote pan genome analysis

salmid.description: SalmID - Rapid confirmation of Salmonella spp. and subspp. from sequence data

samtools.description: Samtools - A suite of programs for interacting with high-throughput sequencing data. It consists of three separate repositories

seqsero.description: SeqSero - Salmonella serotyping from genome sequencing data

seqsero2.description: SeqSero2 - Salmonella serotype prediction from genome sequencing data

seqtk.description: SeqTK - Toolkit for processing sequences in FASTA/Q formats

seqyclean.description: SeqyClean - Pre-process and clean NGS data in order to prepare for downstream analysis

seroba.description: Seroba - k-mer based Pipeline to identify the Serotype from Illumina NGS reads

serotypefinder.description: SerotypeFinder - identifies the serotype in total or partial sequenced isolates of E. coli

sistr.description: SISTR - Salmonella in silico typing resource command-line tool

skesa.description: SKESA - NCBI's de novo genome assemlber

snippy.description: Snippy - Rapid haploid variant calling and core genome alignment

snp-dists.description: SNP-dists - Pairwise SNP distance matrix from a FASTA sequence alignment

snp-sites.description: SNP-sites - Finds SNP sites from a multi-FASTA alignment file

sra-toolkit.description: SRA ToolKit - Collection of tools and libraries for using data in the INSDC Sequence Read Archives.
sra-toolkit.help:
SRA toolkit tool must be specified, e.g. staphb-tk sra-toolkit fasterq-dump, staphb-tk sra-toolkit sra-pileup, etc. 

More info on SRA Toolkit usage at: https://trace.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Traces/sra/sra.cgi?view=toolkit_doc

staramr.description: StarAMR - Scans genome contigs against the ResFinder, PlasmidFinder, and PointFinder databases

tiptoft.description: TipToft - Predict plasmids from uncorrected long read data

trimmomatic.description: Trimmomatic - Flexible read trimming tool for Illumina NGS data

trycycler.description: Trycycler - a tool for generating consensus long-read assemblies for bacterial genomes it can combine multiple long-read assemblies into a single high quality assembly

unicycler.description: Unicycler - an assembly pipeline for bacterial genomes

vigor4.description: VIGOR4 (Viral Genome ORF Reader) is a Java application to predict protein sequences encoded in viral genomes

virsorter2.description: VirSorter2 - applies a multi-classifier, expert-guided approach to detect diverse DNA and RNA virus genomes

wtdbg2.description: WTDBG2 - Fuzzy Bruijn graph approach to long noisy reads assembly
